trans-unit.source: Korisničko ime i/ili lozinka su prazni. Molimo pokušajte ponovo
trans-unit.target: Username and/or password are empty. Please fill in the fields.

trans-unit.source: Korisničko ime i/ili lozinka nisu ispravno unešeni. Molimo pokušajte ponovo
trans-unit.target: Username and/or password are not correct. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: Za prave knjiške moljce smo pripremili puno iznenađenja....
trans-unit.target: For passionate readers we've prepared something special...

trans-unit.source: Bogat asortiman, knjige po Vašem ukusu
trans-unit.target: Rich offer, books by Your taste

trans-unit.source: Pročitali ste knjigu i želite da nam prenesete utiske?
trans-unit.target: You've read the book and want to share Your impressions?

trans-unit.source: Trenutno nema komentara, molimo pokušajte kasnije
trans-unit.target: No comments at the moment, please try again later
Click on the star to choose rating

trans-unit.source: Unesite željeni komentar za ovu knjigu
trans-unit.target: Please enter the comment for this book
* comment needs to have at least 5 characters

trans-unit.source: Nakon dodavanja/izmene ocene biće onemogućeno brisanje/izmena ocene u narednih 10 dana.
trans-unit.target: After submitting/editing the comment any further action will be disabled for the next 10 days.

trans-unit.source: Uspešno ste ostavili ocenu, hvala Vam!
trans-unit.target: You've successfully left the comment. Thank You for that!

trans-unit.source: Da li ste sigurni da želite da obrišete komentar?
trans-unit.target: Are You sure you want to delete the comment?
The comment has been deleted successfully

trans-unit.source: Komentar nije moguće obrisati u narednih dana.
trans-unit.target: You cannot delete Your comment for the next days.

x.equiv-text: {{ !expanded.getValue() ? 'Read the whole comment' : 'Hide the whole comment' }}

trans-unit.source: Nismo uspeli da pronađemo knjige za zadati kriterijum ''
trans-unit.target: We didn't manage to find books with the given criteria ''

trans-unit.source: Da li ste sigurni da želite da obrišete preporuku?
trans-unit.target: Are You sure You want to delete recommendation?
Take a sneak peek at our offer

trans-unit.source: Pogledajte preporuke koje su Vam drugi korisnici uputili...
trans-unit.target: View all the recommendations other users sent You...

trans-unit.source: Da li ste sigurni da želite da obrišete preporuku?
trans-unit.target: Are You sure you want to delete recommendation?

trans-unit.source: Da li ste sigurni da želite da obrišete sve preporuke?
trans-unit.target: Are You sure You want to delete all recommendations?

trans-unit.source: Ko mi je preporucio ovu knjigu?
Drugi korisnici i dalje čitaju knjige
